Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Gentamicin Synergy Screen
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Gentamicin Synergy Screen for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, specifically adding Gentamicin Synergy Screen for Enterococcus species
